original_title: 実録！！ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像３５
overview: The 35th installment of a popular series that carefully selects horror videos that have been posted and introduces all 10 episodes! ! So far, I've introduced strange phenomena that are reflected in home videos of ordinary households, and ghosts that have slipped into surveillance cameras. This time as well, at "Local Station", it is a video of showing a friend who came to the countryside from afar to visit the local area. A friend is surprised by the station of the Locus Line, which cannot be seen in the city center, and an eerie figure is reflected beside him.
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 35
